book.synopsis: Oliver makes friends with Albert, the new boy in class, and they have fun together, playing kickball and collecting bugs. By the creators of Amanda Pig, Schoolgirl. Reprint.
book.title_long: Oliver and Albert, Friends Forever (Easy-to-Read, Puffin)
